system.description: Effect: The user may take a Held item from one of their their Item Slots, a Container, or within reach, making it Held, or store an equipped Held item in a Container or an available, applicable Item Slot.

actions.name: Draw/Store
actions.description: Effect: The user may take a Held item from one of their their Item Slots, a Container, or within reach, making it Held, or store an equipped Held item in a Container or an available, applicable Item Slot.
